column4: I know linux is virus free for the most part, but if using frotwire will there be a chance for any virus?
you can possible download windows virii, yes, but they will have no affect on your linux machine. i would still check them if you move them to a windows box

to my understanding, any linux "virus" must be run with root powers to do any serious damage. and i find it unlikely that you will be downloading anything in frostwire that you will run as root in linux ;)
